pullrequest.title: Refactor the mechansim for specifying the sdf file file callback

content.raw:
There is are still calls to `sdf::setFindCallback` at [gazebo.cc:62](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bb288c0bb814b69d0265bdc2ef91147fc46be2e6/gazebo/gazebo.cc?at=sdf_find_file_refactor#cl-62) and [ServerFixture.hh:141](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bb288c0bb814b69d0265bdc2ef91147fc46be2e6/test/ServerFixture.hh#cl-141). I think these references can be deleted, since calls to `PreLoad` have been added to these files.

There's still a call at [gzsdf.cc:85](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bb288c0bb814b69d0265bdc2ef91147fc46be2e6/tools/gzsdf.cc?at=sdf_find_file_refactor#cl-85). I suspect `gzlog` and `gzfactory` could use a `PreLoad` call as well. We may as well throw in `examples/stand_alone/{listener|publisher}` while we're at it.
content.html:
There is are still calls to sdf::setFindCallback at gazebo.cc:62 and ServerFixture.hh:141. I think these references can be deleted, since calls to PreLoad have been added to these files.

There's still a call at gzsdf.cc:85. I suspect gzlog and gzfactory could use a PreLoad call as well. We may as well throw in examples/stand_alone/{listener|publisher} while we're at it.
